name: B4 Nice Plaza

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel location is nice, the lobby is very nice, roof terrace is very pretty and lovely view....but the rooms are very basic. The room we were in was shabby and the bathroom is very out of date.
reviews.title: Nice public areas, shame about the rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For the price per night the room we stayed in was quite shocking, although clean it was very out of date, basic and didn't even have tea/coffee, double beds were 2 twins pushed together and we were told that all the rooms in the hotel are the same.
reviews.title: Lovely room & terrace

reviews.text: However apart from that the hotel is nice, there are no fitness facilites, the beach is 2 minute walk and location is great.
reviews.title: Good Location - Great roof top restaurant - average rooms

reviews.text: If you are booking this hotel keep in mind that the rooms are more 2 star, but the rest of the hotel is nice.
reviews.title: Get a room with a balcony!

reviews.text: We stayed in a deluxe room for our honeymoon. The room was clean and well appointed with the most effective sound-proofing I've ever come across, couldn't hear a thing. The view across the gardens in front and the sea was stunning. Breakfast on the terrace was quite dear (28 euro) but what a view and the food just kept on coming till we could take no more. Well situated on the edge of the old town.
reviews.title: What you see is not what you get

reviews.text: I had already booked a last minute deal at the Boscolo Plaza when I read the reviews. Since I was taking an elderly lady who had been ill, I was horrified by what I read, and tried to cancel. Last minute.com said this was impossible without a penalty of around £150 out of a total cost of £408. So I telephoned the hotel, and spoke to a receptionist called Sandra. She was sympathetic and reassuring, and promised "a nice room, and a free upgrade to a bigger one if available" On arrival, Sandra greeted us. We were early, but the upgraded room was ready. It had 3 beds, lots of space, was at the back of the hotel and very quiet, and the beds were possibly the most comfortable I have encountered away from home. I have stayed in 2 other 4 stars in Nice, and the Boscolo Plaza compared very favourably.
reviews.title: Excellent treatment at the Boscolo Plaza

reviews.text: I had occasion to use the business centre - it's a pity there is no internet access fom the rooms, but I had no difficulty in accessing the centre.
reviews.title: Reasonably good hotel, but not first-class

reviews.text: I needed a hotel for 6 of my colleagues and myself in Nice last february. Luckily or not so luckily we were on business during the time of the famous carnival so it was not easy to find rooms but finally i managed it with a very helpful lady from the reservation team of Boscolo.
reviews.title: Business trip in Nice
Excellent weekend break
reviews.text: At the end she even offered some rooms with complimentary upgrades to sea-view rooms and I was lucky enough to get one of the rooms on the top floor, with huge balcony, overlooking a beautiful park and the sea!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Some of the rooms are a bit worn, but there are also some fully refurbished in nice cream colors. Only negativism maybe that the walls are extremly thin, so people talking loud on the corridors or watching tv right next to you might be disturbing...
reviews.title: Totally fab Terrace

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was ok, nothing special, but staff was very helpful, friendly throughout my whole stay.
reviews.title: Good Room, Location & Price

reviews.text: Hotel has excellent location, not on the Promenade, so not so noisy, shops, cafés, restaurants, everything in walking distance, and even with rental car its not a big deal to find your way from/to the airport.
reviews.title: Good value

reviews.text: Poor quality for a 4 stars hotel. We haven't hot water in the morning due to late repair in the night!! TV program are old and the system very basic (may be ranged for a 1 star hotel !) Room are very old and some time dirty. Wall paper in some rooms is missing and in some bathroom the ground is brake. Also very poor pressure for water !
reviews.title: Avoid!

likes.liked: — Horrible - Inadmissible to offer a 4-star like that
likes.disliked: — Dilapidated room, 20 year old bathroom, outdated phone system.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: enjoyed everything

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our second visit to Nice. We chose the Plaza after looking at various hotels on our first trip. After booking, we were horrified to read the reviews in Tripadvisor - and almost cancelled. We are now delighted we did not.
reviews.title: Great location, great restaurant, too bad about the rooms

reviews.text: Our de luxe room, on the fifth floor, was spacious and spotlessly clean with a marvellous view of the bay and gardens. Everything was in full working order, including the sound proofing and air conditioning. The balcony was large enough for two loungers and a table and chairs where we had many enjoyable meals.
reviews.title: Shabby without the Chic!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel breakfast room had sufficient tables to cater easily for the guests and the staff were always attentive and pleasant. The breakfast itself was plentiful and varied, particularly in choice of fresh fruit.
reviews.title: Just Okay

description: The B4 Nice Plaza has a priviledged situation in the heart of Nice . Between Place Masséna and Promenade des Anglais , facing the Mediterranean, two steps from the old town prestigious boutiques (Chanel, Vuitton) and the congress center, the hotel is ideal for business or leisure stays.Most of the 172 rooms and suites offer breathtaking view on the Bay of Angels and gardens with balcony or terrace. Discover the luxury of space in a Mediterranean atmosphere. : Blue, yellow, red are reminding sun, sea and mountains. The deluxe room newly decorated propose an atmosphere of rest and intimacy : Elegance and design of the white leather is combined with warm colors of brown and beige, marble and aluminum.The main advantage is restaurant « La Terrasse ». Located on the roof top it offers a panoramic view at 360°on the sea, the old town and the gardens. Discover fresh and autentic cuisine from of "Nicois" Chef . The lounge bar propose special evenings during the sumer period.
